work highly organized can work under tight deadline schedules Work Experience Java Developer CITI Group December 2017 to Present Description CCAR RWA forecasting is a critical function within risk organization which oversees RWA forecasting for all business lines Forecasted numbers is a great forward looking indicator on the amount of future regulatory capital necessary during a stressed or severely stressed environment which goes as an input to CCAR Fed reporting The application will be used in calculating Risk Weight Assets projections for securitization exposures for both Banking Book and Trading Book using BASEL 3 Advanced and Standardized approaches and prepare high quality presentation of RWA projection Key stake holders such as Business Finance and Independent Risk Management
